name: GoKart - New Mexico
description:
Players, start your engines!

Racing game like no other! Driving as it is meant to be. Extremely fast, extremely fun! So far unseen experience of using your cellphone as input controller - accurate, responsive, natural and simple!

In this PC/Mac game you get to use your cellphone as a steering wheel controller (free Android and iPhone apps). 

Challenge your friends - up to 4 players split screen. Show your driving skills!

Mind blowing fast racing game unlike anything you have played so far. Natural steering input through cellphone provides cutting edge driving experience with razor edge precision - crazy powerslides and drifts, tight cornering and swift turns. 

Besides steering input your phone provides continuous gas and brake input for ulitmate drive joy! 

Zero hassle connection and no calibration - just drive!

MAC USERS

It might happen that when you try to run the game (or demo) you get the message:

You do not have permission to open the application “gokartNM_Mac64_demo”.

In that case, you will have to do the following:

sudo chmod -R 755 path_to_GoKartNM_Mac64_Demo.app sudo xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine GoKartNM_Mac64_Demo.app

This can probably be avoided by buying the game through the Steam - where it will be available soon.

DEMO LIMITATIONS

Only one race track is available in one direction for 2 laps.

FREE APPS FOR CELLPHONE CONTROLLER

GoKartNM - Steering Wheel

currently under review - coming soon!

FEATURES

  • Single player race against the clock or multiplayer split-screen up to 4 players
  • 2 players split-screen vertical and horizontal split option
  • Super simple to connect, no calibration, just fun
  • Extremely fast racing and accurate input control
  • Novel and exciting game experience unseen ever before - using cellphone as controller
  • Force feedback - phone vibrates when close to skidding enabling pushing the car to the limit
  • Artistic effects - signature color for each player - sunglasses, tire skidmarks and burn smoke
  • Skidmarks remain forever and mix colors if more than one player racing - see how you did that curve in the previous lap
  • Meticulously designed numerous tracks with more on the way!
  • Indoors/outdoors and night races [*]Various dynamic camera views with awesome cockpit and HUD 
  • Car and tires get dirty in the sand, sand spraying around - tires get clean 
  • Super fun collisions with other players 
  • Unique custom physics car model - with adjustable driver's weight! 
  • Free look around using joystick on the cell phone 
  • Many fun features - sunglasses, horn, reverse gear, rearview cam 
  • Beautiful Custom handmade graphics

ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
